description:
When we first met Shane, he told us that he is mostly a top.

By "mostly" he meant that he has bottomed a few times on his own.

"It's been about a year," he said. "It's been a while."

"Do you enjoy bottoming?"

"Yeah," he said. "With the right guy."

Well, it seems like Mitch is the right guy.

Check out the way Shane squirms while Mitch fucks him!

I also love how Shane gets that "lost in another world" look that bottoms get when they're really into it!
title: Shane & Mitch
